S.FORM: Connie Mack Berry nalecuhan i Greenville, South Carolina, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. nalecuhan ciniza i 4 a bulad 15 a demiad, 1915 a mihca, Connie Mack Berry, miunduay. (mapatay i 1980 a mihca) namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
